projects.Title: Contest Tracker
projects.Description: Contest Tracker is a full-stack MERN application designed for competitive programmers to stay updated on upcoming coding contests from platforms like Codeforces, CodeChef, and LeetCode. The app offers real-time contest tracking with advanced filtering options based on platforms, dates, and contest status. Users can bookmark favorite contests, view today's competitions at a glance, and track past contests with solution links.
Features: Real-time contest data from Codeforces, CodeChef, and LeetCode
Filter contests by platform, duration, and contest status
Today's contests view for quick access to imminent competitions
Bookmark functionality for saving important contests
Dark/light mode UI theme switching
Solution submission for past contests
Responsive design for mobile and desktop

projects.Title: SociaLink
projects.Description: SociaLink is a real-time chat application that enables users to connect and communicate instantly. Built with modern web technologies, it offers a seamless messaging experience with features like real-time message delivery, online user status, and image sharing capabilities.
Features: Real-time messaging with Socket.IO
User authentication and authorization
Online/offline user status indicators
Image sharing support via Cloudinary
Responsive design for all devices
Multiple themes support

projects.Title: AI Lead Management System
projects.Description: The AI-Powered Lead Management System is designed to help businesses track, score, and engage with leads efficiently. It automates lead capture, assigns scores based on user interactions, and triggers marketing actions accordingly. The system also provides an admin dashboard to manage leads and view analytics. With AI-based scoring and automated follow-ups, businesses can enhance their conversion rates and optimize sales workflows.
Features: Lead capturing and deduplication
AI-based lead scoring system
Automated email and WhatsApp follow-ups based on lead scores
Admin dashboard for managing and tracking leads
Authentication system for secure user access
LocalStorage-based tracking for user interactions
Integration with OpenAI for AI-driven recommendations
Role-based access control for different user types

projects.Title: Culinary Delight
projects.Description: Culinary Delight is a user-friendly application that allows users to discover, save, and share their favorite recipes. Users can search for recipes by ingredients or categories, submit their own community recipes with images, rate and review recipes from other users, and manage their favorites in a personalized collection. The application features user authentication, detailed recipe instructions, and a modern responsive interface with dark mode support.
Features: Search recipes by ingredients, cuisine, and meal type
User authentication with registration and login
Community recipe sharing with image uploads
Rate and review community recipes
Save and manage favorite recipes
Detailed recipe pages with ingredients and step-by-step instructions
Dark mode support for better user experience

projects.Title: QuestSearch
projects.Description: QuestSearch is a specialized search platform for finding curated questions and answers across different categories. The application provides an intuitive interface with real-time search highlighting, advanced filtering options, and server-side pagination for efficient browsing. Built with modern React and TypeScript, it offers a responsive design that works seamlessly across devices.
Features: Real-time search with text highlighting
Type-based filtering system for questions
Server-side pagination with customizable items per page
Responsive design for all device sizes
Elegant error handling and loading states

projects.Title: Smart Voice
projects.Description: Smart Voice is an AI-powered voice assistant application that transcribes and analyzes spoken meetings and conversations. It automatically extracts key information such as meeting details, action items, decisions, and summaries, allowing users to focus on the conversation instead of taking notes. The app transcribes voice recordings in real-time and uses advanced NLP to generate structured summaries that can be easily shared via email.
Features: Real-time speech-to-text transcription
Automatic extraction of meeting details including date, time, and participants
Identification and tracking of action items with assignees and deadlines
Generation of structured meeting summaries including key points, decisions, and next steps
Easy sharing of meeting summaries via email
Voice-controlled commands for hands-free interaction
Integration with various APIs for enhanced processing

projects.Title: SociaLink-Old
projects.Description: SociaLink is a real-time chat application that enables users to connect in different chat rooms. The platform offers a modern, responsive design with a focus on ease of use and seamless communication between users.
Features: Real-time messaging with Socket.IO
Multiple chat rooms for different topics
User authentication and authorization
Responsive design for all devices
Mobile compatibility for on-the-go chatting
Contact form for user feedback
